page.title: 11ECOLOGY _ EPPING GREEN
page.content: EACH POND NEXT TO THE FOREST WAY FOOT PATH WAS MAPPED BY A 10m*10m PLAN AND A SURVEY DONE OF THE LAND AROUND IT.THE WATER WAS TESTED WITH UNIVERSAL INDICATOR PAPER AND TURMERIC PAPER.ALL THE PONDS WERE NEUTRAL AND SHOWED NO AMMONIA OR SULPHIDE POLLUTION.WE DETECTED NO FOAM OR OTHER SIGNS OF POLLUTION.LICHEN SURVEYS SHOWED NO POLLUTION AND STICKLE BACKS,FROGS,AND A WIDE VARIETY OF OTHER ANIMAL LIFE WAS FOUND.WATER AND LAND PLANTS GREW VIGOROUSLY AROUND THE PONDS.THE CULTIVATED FIELDS WERE RELATIVELY SMALL, AND LARGE BANDS OF HEDGEROW WERE LEFT AROUND THE EDGES WHICH GAVE GOOD SHELTER FOR WILDLIFE.THERE WAS EVIDENCE OF CROP ROTATION WITH GRASSLAND AND CEREAL FIELDS.
